title: Reputed NY mobster faces trial for 1978 'Goodfellas' heist
text:
Published By: Reuters - US News - Today 
NEW YORK (Reuters) - For nearly four decades, it remained one of America's most infamous unsolved crimes: on Dec. 11, 1978, a crew of masked...
